thread.section_title: Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good price; nice renovations
thread.title_full: Good price; nice renovations - Review of Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Passowilli
title: Good price; nice renovations
text: Nowhere in NY could you be better located with regard to access to subway lines. The room, though small, felt clean and renewed. Bathroom great. Storing clothes is a problem--only a dark closet without drawers and just one shelf. Hall noise can be significant if your neighbors are noisy. Staff uniformly nice and helpful. At the moment, you have to go out of the hotel (to Starbucks or Pret a Manger next door) for morning coffee, and the lines in both places tend to be long. Continuing renovations to an adjacent property may change that.
